sentences.english: The plasticizer has obvious influence on the potential response and membrane conductivity of the electrode.
sentences.chinese: 增塑劑對電極的電位響應及膜電導有明顯的影響。

sentences.english: The polyester plasticizers are basically innocuity.
As a chemical intermediate in the production of plasticisers, flotation agents etc.
sentences.chinese: 作爲製造增塑劑，浮選劑等之中間體。

sentences.english: Tributyl citrate is a new material of non-toxic plasticizer.
sentences.chinese: 檸檬酸三丁酯是一種新型無毒增塑劑。

sentences.english: The properties of starch-based degradable plastic with glycerol as the plasticizer have been summarized in present paper.
sentences.chinese: 描述了以甘油作爲增塑劑製造的澱粉塑料的一些性質。

sentences.english: Not having plasticizers also means it will not leach out hazardous compounds in the field.
sentences.chinese: 不使用增塑劑，也意味着它不會釋放出有害化合物。

sentences.english: Higher fatty alcohol is an important raw material forplastifier and surface active agent.
sentences.chinese: 高級脂肪醇是增塑劑和表面活性劑的重要原料。

sentences.english: Dibutyl phthalate is commonly employed as such a plasticizer .
sentences.chinese: 酞酸二丁酯一般用來作爲這類增塑劑。

sentences.english: Effect on other performance is the same for both plasticizers.
sentences.chinese: 兩種增塑劑對坯料其它性能的影響基本相同。

sentences.english: An intermediate in the manufacture of pharmaceutical products and plasticisers.
sentences.chinese: 醫藥原料及增塑劑合成用之中間體。

sentences.english: The cold—lust of the plasticizing agent that use it as material is better than the ester of Butanone and Octanol.
sentences.chinese: 以它爲原料的增塑劑耐寒性優於丁醇和辛醇的酯類。

sentences.english: It can thus be seen , plasticizers security that is a very complex task.
sentences.chinese: 由此可以看出，增塑劑安全是一個非常複雜的任務。

sentences.english: TO open the plasticizers of soybean oil waste, the quite good technique conditions are established.
sentences.chinese: 爲開發大豆油腳環氧增塑劑，確立了較佳工藝條件。

sentences.english: It can also be used to produce the skin molding agent of electric welding bar and wet state binder.
sentences.chinese: 還可作爲溼態粘合劑和藥皮增塑劑用於電焊條製造業。

sentences.english: The loss of plasticizers was determined by using accelerated tests method.
sentences.chinese: 用加速試驗考察貯存時增塑劑的損失。
